评论概述: This runs big and feels a little cheap
评论详情: I purchased this for Halloween this year.  I bought the size based on the size chart and Amazon's recommendation.The look of the dress was cute.  Once I tried it on, the dress felt a little cheap and slightly itchy.  The dress has no belt loops, so the belt doesn't stay in place very well.The recommended size was a little large on me.  I didn't have any problem with it being tight in the chest.I definitely recommend getting can-cans to wear with it.
The zipper came broke, was going to use this for my Halloween costume but I guess not now :/

This dress is design accurate to the first outfit in the Barbie movie! BUT with some caveats:  1. It's one single layer. The fabric is nice at least, but a dress really needs more than just one thin layer. The good news is that the fabric is just thick enough to not be see through. 2. The skirt does not fan out like the picture. Likely because it's literally just one sheet of fabric. You will need to buy a petticoat skirt to go underneath.  But otherwise the design/look is spot on. The fit of the dress works really well and you could tie the straps shorter if you need the top/chest part to fit better. I have to disagree with the other review about chest size: I have a smedium chest and the medium fit perfectly. Follow the size chart.  My expectations for the quality of this dress were average/less than average and the product pleasantly surprised me.

This is definitely meant to be a Halloween costume, not a regular dress like I was hoping. So I can only use it for Halloween. I’m sure the kids at trunk or treat will love it and it will be fun for a costume. It is a super weird fit, the chest is meant for huge boobs. I don’t think it’s washable, I’m too scared to try lol. The zipper is pretty annoying, and it wrinkles really easily.

After reading the most recent reviews, I went with a smaller size.  The dress is cute but incredibly thin. It’s not structured at all.  Even then, I would have kept the dress for Barbie if it had fit over my nice petticoat.  It’s barely an A-line, let alone a 1950s style circle skirt.  Super disappointed.  It barely sat over the top of my petticoat and squished it down.  If you don’t care about accuracy and you are ok with the skirt laying flat, it might work for you.  My measurements are 37, 29, 38 for reference.  The size worked fine, but it’s going back.
Looks way better in picture, looks thin and ugly in person.

评论概述: It Zips but Is it Worth it
评论详情: I am around 5'7 and 240 but I am top heavy. I am a chesty girl 44DD. Usually around 16-18 pants but 2x-3x top. Tried 4X because unfortunately I know plus sizing is never accurate. I do give this brand props because I was able to zip this dress. Very stretchy fabric on the top and I absolutely love that. Unfortunately where it hit me was directly under the bust line and not at the waist so I had this unfortunate pregnant look/feeling going on so I ended up returning it.

I ordered this dress because the photo was so cute, it looked like a nicely structured dress. I ordered two sizes up and I still could not zip the dress closed, which zips on the side, under the arm, always an awkward place for a zipper anyway. The dress is made from a thin cotton fabric that wrinkles easily, I'm not sure if after ironing it, it would stay that way, since I did not keep the dress. Very Cute, but not true to size at all.
Zipper broke before I could even wear it to the event. I plan on returning it.

评论概述: Pink and white checkered Barbie tie shoulder dress: weird fit
评论详情: This was going to be my Halloween outfit for Barbie, but I'm going to have to really fix the top wildly for this to work.  It is longer than expected, and the top is made for giant armpit holes and massive side boob. The belt is long (can go around 3x). The very weirdest part, though, is the top. It's made for a linebacker's chest, ultra wide and awkward. It seems like the only way to fix it would be to fold in a bunch of extra material and sew it and cut it off, but then the strap location might be a bit weird.  This dress would work if you're 5'5" with giant boobs. If you're shorter than that, it's going to look long (past the knee). If you do not have giant boobs, add on some extra socks to your order to stuff your bra with to pull this one off.  The material is silky and nice.
Beautiful I’m short with a full figure, my sister & I are going on a cruise & she wanted to wear 50’s dresses, I sent back about 5-6 dresses (sorry amazon). This one is perfect!!
This is just what I was looking for a sock hop party/dance.  It's great as a costume, but I wouldn't recommend for regular wear.  I couldn't get the shipping wrinkles ironed out.
